content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper plate factory at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace at position (61.0, -52.0)
- Furnace at position (63.0, -52.0)
- Furnace at position (65.0, -52.0)

### Copper plate mine at position(-28.5, -61.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough capacity to accept the items being inserted. Check the current inventory of the furnace before inserting.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for existing entities in the target location.
